hero.heading: Our Litters
hero.subtext: Explore our current and past Ragdoll litters

currentLitters.title: Current Litters
currentLitters.description: Our newest litters with kittens available now. Contact us to arrange a visit.

upcomingLitters.title: Upcoming Litters
upcomingLitters.description: We're excited to share our planned litters. Contact us to reserve a kitten from these upcoming litters.

pastLitters.title: Past Litters
pastLitters.description: Browse through our previous litters to see the beautiful kittens we've produced.

info.heading: Interested in our kittens?
info.subtext: If you're interested in reserving a kitten from our upcoming litters or have questions about availability, please don't hesitate to contact us.
